Text:
FYI the real shit (genuine BD) will be released in about a month, so till then all versions floating around are just ok but not perfect.
I'll encode my 1080p BDRip only when an original BD copy will be available. To be honest I wasn't impressed with the quality of this copy, I prefer to wait.

Yeah, I think you're right. I downloaded this 720p file. http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8398204/The.Last.Stand.2013.720p.BluRay.DTS.x264-PublicHD Took a random look at a few scenes, starts to stutter at 1:25:47 probably other places too. Best to wait.
